titles.title: Debt Crisis Resolution Act of 2011
To cancel public debt held by the Federal Reserve System and to lower the public debt limit by an equal amount.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/1/2011--Introduced. Debt Crisis Resolution Act of 2011 - Instructs the Secretary of the Treasury to cancel all federal public debt obligations held by the Federal Reserve System.
